articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Drop Duchy is a deck-building, Tetris-like, Carcassonne-esque puzzler - Ars Technica
articles.description: The game layers tile dropping onto worker placement, and stacks up nicely.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: World First: US Baby Treated With Personalized CRISPR Gene-Editing - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A US infant with a rare condition has become history's first patient to be treated with a personalized gene-editing technique that raises hopes for other people with obscure illnesses, doctors said Thursday.
